description: Returns information about the specified segment. Specify the segment you want to view by specifying its ARN.

parameters.name: segment
parameters.description: The ARN of the segment to return information for.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that this segment was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The customer-created description for this segment.

nested_items.name: experimentCount
nested_items.description: The number of experiments that this segment is used in. This count includes all current experiments, not just those that are currently running.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that this segment was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: launchCount
nested_items.description: The number of launches that this segment is used in. This count includes all current launches, not just those that are currently running.

nested_items.name: pattern
nested_items.description: The pattern that defines the attributes to use to evalute whether a user session will be in the segment. For more information about the pattern syntax, see Segment rule pattern syntax.
